title: Welcome to Omega Chi Epsilon
text:
Welcome!
This is the new home page for Purdue’s Chemical Engineering Honors Society.

title: Omega Chi Epsilon - Purdue
Welcome to Omega Chi Epsilon - Purdue Chapter
text:
title: “Welcome” format: html


Welcome to Omega Chi Epsilon - Purdue Chapter
Omega Chi Epsilon (ΟΧΕ) is the National Honor Society for Chemical Engineering students. We promote excellence in chemical engineering through scholarship, leadership, service, and character.
